about_the_game:
Original soundtrack for The Final Specimen: Arrival. This DLC contains all 18 level, cutscene, and title tracks in high quality 320 kbps MP3 format.

Track Listing

  • The Final Specimen Theme
  • Earth 1996
  • The Tube
  • Invaders from Space
  • Doofusville
  • Not Here to Attack
  • Downtown Doofusville
  • Missile Attack
  • Marty's Pizza Shop
  • Evil about
  • The Lost Woods
  • Nighttime in the Neighborhood
  • The Human Will to Survive
  • City Chase
  • Far from over
  • Credits Medley
  • Game over

name: The Final Specimen: Arrival - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound

short_description: All 18 original level, cutscene and title tracks in high quality 320 kbps MP3 format.
